  • Classes in com.ooyala.android.configuration used by com.ooyala.android.configuration 
    Class and Description
    ExoConfiguration
    A read-only configuration of ExoPlayer functionality in the OoyalaPlayer.
    ExoConfiguration.Builder
    Build the object of ExoPlayer configurations
    FCCTVRatingConfiguration
    Use this when first setting up the OoyalaPlayer to control the layout and behavior of the TV Ratings stamp.
    FCCTVRatingConfiguration.Builder
    Supports a fluid syntax for configuration.
